mapper.select: SELECT SYS_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_ID, SYS_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME, SYS_SUBJECT.STATUS, SYS_SUBJECT.CREATE_TIME, SYS_SUBJECT.PARENT_ID, SYS_SUBJECT.sort FROM SYS_SUBJECT WHERE SYS_SUBJECT.STATUS=0 AND SYS_SUBJECT.PARENT_ID=0 ORDER BY sort desc

SELECT SYS_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_ID, SYS_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME, SYS_SUBJECT.STATUS, SYS_SUBJECT.CREATE_TIME, SYS_SUBJECT.PARENT_ID, SYS_SUBJECT.sort FROM SYS_SUBJECT WHERE SYS_SUBJECT.STATUS=0 and SYS_SUBJECT.PARENT_ID=#{parent_id} ORDER BY sort desc
